topic.fullpath: Topic :: Internet :: Other file transfer protocol

name: SteffTP
short_description: SteffTP is a protocol and library for file transfer, similar to currently unimplemented single-port FTP. It also offers possibility to write partial content, which, with SSL, should make it usable for replacing SMB, NFS and AFP in Internet context.
